text: There will be no power supply in the following places on Wednesday from 9 45 a.m. to 4 p.m. due to shutdown at Ambikapuram sub-station for maintenance work, according to a press release by the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation: Ariamangalam, Golden Rock Military colony, Ambikapuram, Rail Nagar, Nehruji Nagar, Rajappa Nagar, Kamaraj Nagar, Malaiappa Nagar, Kattur Pappakurichi, Kailash Nagar, Sakthi Nagar, Balaji Nagar, Melakalkandarkottai, Alathur, Venkateswara Nagar, MGR Nagar, part of Kottapattu, Thiru Nagar, Adaikala Annai Nagar, Nathamadipatti, Keelakurichi, Sangiliandapuram and Senthanneerpuram.
title: Power shutdown
